activities: TrialScope creates software for the publication of clinical trial data within europe and the United States. The software is sold as a Saas service which allows companies to access the application from the Internet. The application collects basic personal information from the users of the application such as email address, name, title. Each time a user is added to the application service the basic personal information is collected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The clinical trial disclosure application collects data about the users of the application such as name, title, email address, supervisor's email address. This data is used to grant users access to the application. The data is not manipulated or processed in any way.in any way and is not disclosed to third parties or tranferred onwards to any other parties.
recoursemech: dispute resolution is handled by TRUSTe
